metadata.synopsis: One liner AD reaction from a companion of the character that has acquired a player portrait from oskar. This PAD will only trigger if there is a companion nearby the player that talked to Oskar
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1 - Have at least one party member with you2 - Teleport to CTY_Main_A -52; 27; 7383 - Talk to oskar and buy a portrait4 - Leave dialog

0.speaker: Player
0.text: A good likeness. Though I prefer the real thing.
